"0.00" : "0");                  else                      item.SubItems.Add(credit.CalculateActualOlb().GetFormatedValue(credit.UseCents));                  item.SubItems.Add(credit.Product.Currency.Code);                  item.SubItems.Add(Math.Round(credit.InterestRate * 100' decimalPlaces).ToString());                  item.SubItems.Add(credit.InstallmentType.Name);                  item.SubItems.Add(credit.NbOfInstallments.ToString());                  item.SubItems.Add(credit.CreationDate.ToShortDateString());                  item.SubItems.Add(credit.StartDate.ToShortDateString());                  item.SubItems.Add(credit.CloseDate.ToShortDateString());                    if (credit.ContractStatus != OContractStatus.Abandoned && credit.ContractStatus != OContractStatus.Refused)                  {                        if (credit.ContractStatus != OContractStatus.Closed)                      {                            totalAmount += credit.Amount;                          totalAmountInPivot += customExchangeRate.Rate == 0                                                    ?
